title: Bhuna Gosht
procedure: Heat mustard oil in a pan and saut√© onions till golden brown.
Add ginger garlic paste and cook till the raw smell disappears.
Add lamb shanks and cook till brown.
Mix in turmeric, chili powder, and coriander powder.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook till they soften.
Pour in milk and cook till the gravy thickens.
Garnish with coriander and serve with roti or naan.
